result.eng: Do you come here often?
result.ga: an dtagann tú anseo go minic
result.orig: an dtagann tú anseo go minic
result.html: an dtagann tú anseo go minicDo you come here often?
result.ponchtml: an dtagann tú anseo go minicDo you come here often?

result.eng: You were supposed to come half an hour ago!
result.ga: bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shin
result.orig: bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shin
result.html: bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shinYou were supposed to come half an hour ago!
result.ponchtml: ḃí tú in ainm teaċt leaṫuair an ċloig ó ẛinYou were supposed to come half an hour ago!

result.eng: A lot of people come here in the summer.
result.ga: bíonn an-chuid daoine ag teacht anseo i rith an tsamhraidh
result.orig: bíonn an-chuid daoine ag teacht anseo i rith an tsamhraidh
result.html: bíonn an-chuid daoine ag teacht anseo i rith an tsamhraidhA lot of people come here in the summer.
result.ponchtml: bíonn an-ċuid daoine ag teaċt anseo i riṫ an tsaṁraiḋA lot of people come here in the summer.

result.eng: Why did you not come?
result.ga: cad chuige nár tháinig tú
result.orig: cad chuige nár tháinig tú
result.html: cad chuige nár tháinig túWhy did you not come?
result.ponchtml: cad ċuige nár ṫáinig túWhy did you not come?

result.eng: When will you come?
result.ga: cathain a thiocfaidh tú
result.orig: cathain a thiocfaidh tú
result.html: cathain a thiocfaidh túWhen will you come?
result.ponchtml: caṫain a ṫiocfaiḋ túWhen will you come?

result.eng: Where did you come from?
result.ga: cá as ar tháinig sibh
result.orig: cá as ar tháinig sibh
result.html: cá as ar tháinig sibhWhere did you come from?
result.ponchtml: cá as ar ṫáinig siḃWhere did you come from?

result.eng: How often does he come?
result.ga: cé chomh minic is a thagann sé
result.orig: cé chomh minic is a thagann sé
result.html: cé chomh minic is a thagann séHow often does he come?
result.ponchtml: cé ċoṁ minic is a ṫagann séHow often does he come?

result.eng: When will you come?
result.ga: cén uair a thiocfaidh tú
result.orig: cén uair a thiocfaidh tú
result.html: cén uair a thiocfaidh túWhen will you come?
result.ponchtml: cén uair a ṫiocfaiḋ túWhen will you come?

result.eng: No matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.
result.ga: dá fhad an oíche tiocfaidh an mhaidin ar deireadh
result.orig: dá fhad an oíche tiocfaidh an mhaidin ar deireadh
result.html: dá fhad an oíche tiocfaidh an mhaidin ar deireadhNo matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.
result.ponchtml: dá ḟad an oíċe tiocfaiḋ an ṁaidin ar deireaḋNo matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.

result.eng: Probably not many people will come.
result.ga: is dócha nach dtiocfaidh mórán daoine
result.orig: is dócha nach dtiocfaidh mórán daoine
result.html: is dócha nach dtiocfaidh mórán daoineProbably not many people will come.
result.ponchtml: is dóċa naċ dtiocfaiḋ mórán daoineProbably not many people will come.

result.eng: Do not take it for granted that she will come.
result.ga: ná déan talamh slán de go dtiocfaidh sí
result.orig: ná déan talamh slán de go dtiocfaidh sí
result.html: ná déan talamh slán de go dtiocfaidh síDo not take it for granted that she will come.
result.ponchtml: ná déan talaṁ slán de go dtiocfaiḋ síDo not take it for granted that she will come.

result.eng: They walked back to the place from which they had come.
result.ga: shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teacht
result.orig: shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teacht
result.html: shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teachtThey walked back to the place from which they had come.
result.ponchtml: ẛiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raiḃ siad tar éis teaċtThey walked back to the place from which they had come.

result.eng: Thousands of people come year after year to take part in the festival.
result.ga: tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaidh bliana chun páirt a ghlacadh san fhéile
result.orig: tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaidh bliana chun páirt a ghlacadh san fhéile
result.html: tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaidh bliana chun páirt a ghlacadh san fhéileThousands of people come year after year to take part in the festival.
result.ponchtml: tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaiḋ bliana ċun páirt a ġlacaḋ san ḟéileThousands of people come year after year to take part in the festival.

result.eng: Come to me across the room.
result.ga: tar chugam trasna an tseomra
result.orig: tar chugam trasna an tseomra
result.html: tar chugam trasna an tseomraCome to me across the room.
result.ponchtml: tar ċugam trasna an tseomraCome to me across the room.

result.eng: After all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.
result.ga: tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteach
result.orig: tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteach
result.html: tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteachAfter all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.
result.ponchtml: tar éis an aiġnis ar fad d'éiriġ linn teaċt ar réiteaċAfter all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.

result.eng: He gave me a promise that he would come back.
result.ga: thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar ais
result.orig: thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar ais
result.html: thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar aisHe gave me a promise that he would come back.
result.ponchtml: ṫug sé geall dom go dtiocfaiḋ sé ar aisHe gave me a promise that he would come back.

result.eng: The post would come at around 7:45 every morning.
result.ga: tháinig an post isteach um 7 45 gach maidin
result.orig: tháinig an post isteach um 7 45 gach maidin
result.html: tháinig an post isteach um 7 45 gach maidinThe post would come at around 7:45 every morning.
result.ponchtml: ṫáinig an post isteaċ um 7 45 gaċ maidinThe post would come at around 7:45 every morning.

result.eng: The storm will come quickly.
result.ga: tiocfaidh an stoirm go gasta
result.orig: tiocfaidh an stoirm go gasta
result.html: tiocfaidh an stoirm go gastaThe storm will come quickly.
result.ponchtml: tiocfaiḋ an stoirm go gastaThe storm will come quickly.

result.eng: We will come without any delay.
result.ga: tiocfaidh muid gan moill ar bith
result.orig: tiocfaidh muid gan moill ar bith
result.html: tiocfaidh muid gan moill ar bithWe will come without any delay.
result.ponchtml: tiocfaiḋ muid gan moill ar biṫWe will come without any delay.

result.eng: Hello to you too. Come in. How are you?
result.ga: dia is muire dhuit tar isteach conas tá tú
result.orig: dia is muire dhuit tar isteach conas tá tú
result.html: dia is muire dhuit tar isteach conas tá túHello to you too. Come in. How are you?
result.ponchtml: dia is muire ḋuit tar isteaċ conas tá túHello to you too. Come in. How are you?

result.eng: Come in. What's your name? I am Máire.
result.ga: tar isteach cad is ainm duit is mise máire
result.orig: tar isteach cad is ainm duit is mise máire
result.html: tar isteach cad is ainm duit is mise máireCome in. What's your name? I am Máire.
result.ponchtml: tar isteaċ cad is ainm duit is mise máireCome in. What's your name? I am Máire.

result.eng: Hi, do you come to this playgroup every two weeks?
result.ga: haigh an dtagann tú go dtí an grúpa spraoi seo 'chuile choicís
result.orig: haigh an dtagann tú go dtí an grúpa spraoi seo 'chuile choicís
result.html: haigh an dtagann tú go dtí an grúpa spraoi seo 'chuile choicísHi, do you come to this playgroup every two weeks?
result.ponchtml: haiġ an dtagann tú go dtí an grúpa spraoi seo 'ċuile ċoicísHi, do you come to this playgroup every two weeks?

result.eng: Do you want to come?
result.ga: an bhfuil sibh ag iarraidh tíocht
result.orig: an bhfuil sibh ag iarraidh tíocht
result.html: an bhfuil sibh ag iarraidh tíochtDo you want to come?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil siḃ ag iarraiḋ tíoċtDo you want to come?

result.eng: You are not too early. Come in.
result.ga: níl tú róluath tar isteach
result.orig: níl tú róluath tar isteach
result.html: níl tú róluath tar isteachYou are not too early. Come in.
result.ponchtml: níl tú róluaṫ tar isteaċYou are not too early. Come in.

result.eng: You must come.
result.ga: caithfidh tú thíocht
result.orig: caithfidh tú thíocht
result.html: caithfidh tú thíochtYou must come.
result.ponchtml: caiṫfiḋ tú ṫíoċtYou must come.

result.eng: Come back here in two weeks' time.
result.ga: tar ar ais anseo i gceann coicíse
result.orig: tar ar ais anseo i gceann coicíse
result.html: tar ar ais anseo i gceann coicíseCome back here in two weeks' time.
result.ponchtml: tar ar ais anseo i gceann coicíseCome back here in two weeks' time.

result.eng: Come here! Into the kitchen with you!
result.ga: gabh i leith uait isteach an chisteanach leat
result.orig: gabh i leith uait isteach an chisteanach leat
result.html: gabh i leith uait isteach an chisteanach leatCome here! Into the kitchen with you!
result.ponchtml: gaḃ i leiṫ uait isteaċ an ċisteanaċ leatCome here! Into the kitchen with you!

result.eng: Come here.
result.ga: gabh i leith uait
result.orig: gabh i leith uait
result.html: gabh i leith uaitCome here.
result.ponchtml: gaḃ i leiṫ uaitCome here.

result.eng: Come on in, friends.
result.ga: tagaigí isteach a chairde
result.orig: tagaigí isteach a chairde
result.html: tagaigí isteach a chairdeCome on in, friends.
result.ponchtml: tagaigí isteaċ a ċairdeCome on in, friends.

result.eng: I'm sorry, but I cannot come.
result.ga: tá aiféala orm ach ní féidir liom tíocht
result.orig: tá aiféala orm ach ní féidir liom tíocht
result.html: tá aiféala orm ach ní féidir liom tíochtI'm sorry, but I cannot come.
result.ponchtml: tá aiféala orm aċ ní féidir liom tíoċtI'm sorry, but I cannot come.

result.eng: Would you like to come to dinner with me tonight?
result.ga: ar mhaith leat teacht le haghaidh dinnéir liom
result.orig: ar mhaith leat teacht le haghaidh dinnéir liom
result.html: ar mhaith leat teacht le haghaidh dinnéir liomWould you like to come to dinner with me tonight?
result.ponchtml: ar ṁaiṫ leat teaċt le haġaiḋ dinnéir liomWould you like to come to dinner with me tonight?

result.eng: Would you like to come to my party?
result.ga: ar mhaith leat teacht chuig mo chóisir
result.orig: ar mhaith leat teacht chuig mo chóisir
result.html: ar mhaith leat teacht chuig mo chóisirWould you like to come to my party?
result.ponchtml: ar ṁaiṫ leat teaċt ċuig mo ċóisirWould you like to come to my party?

result.eng: Does he come here often?
result.ga: an dtagann sé anseo go minic
result.orig: an dtagann sé anseo go minic
result.html: an dtagann sé anseo go minicDoes he come here often?
result.ponchtml: an dtagann sé anseo go minicDoes he come here often?

result.eng: He was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ga: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.orig: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.html: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bithHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé ag breaṫnú ar an doras aṁail is go ḃféadfaḋ an t-áiḃirseoir féin teaċt isteaċ nóiméad ar biṫHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.

result.eng: Where did the wrinkles in his forehead come from?
result.ga: cad as ar tháinig na roic ina éadan
result.orig: cad as ar tháinig na roic ina éadan
result.html: cad as ar tháinig na roic ina éadanWhere did the wrinkles in his forehead come from?
result.ponchtml: cad as ar ṫáinig na roic ina éadanWhere did the wrinkles in his forehead come from?

result.eng: Come on in. Sit down.
result.ga: gabh ar d'aghaidh bí i do shuí
result.orig: gabh ar d'aghaidh bí i do shuí
result.html: gabh ar d'aghaidh bí i do shuíCome on in. Sit down.
result.ponchtml: gaḃ ar d'aġaiḋ bí i do ẛuíCome on in. Sit down.

result.eng: Come here and take a look at her.
result.ga: gabh anseo go bhfeice tú í
result.orig: gabh anseo go bhfeice tú í
result.html: gabh anseo go bhfeice tú íCome here and take a look at her.
result.ponchtml: gaḃ anseo go ḃfeice tú íCome here and take a look at her.

result.eng: I'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ga: beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.orig: beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.html: beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duitI'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ mise anseo fá do ċoinne ag teaċt duitI'll be here for you when you come back.

result.eng: He could not come home with empty pockets.
result.ga: ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmha
result.orig: ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmha
result.html: ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmhaHe could not come home with empty pockets.
result.ponchtml: ní ṫiocfaḋ leis a ġaḃáil ċun an ḃaile ar ṗócaí folṁaHe could not come home with empty pockets.
